mapper.select: SELECT *, TO_CHAR(news_regDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS news_date FROM news WHERE news_banner = true ORDER BY news_num LIMIT 3;
SELECT *, TO_CHAR(news_regDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS news_date FROM news ORDER BY news_regDate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY news_num DESC) rnum, TO_CHAR(news_regDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS news_date FROM news ORDER BY news_num DESC
SELECT *, TO_CHAR(news_regDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS news_date FROM news WHERE news_num = #{news_num}
